statements: SELECT * FROM SupplyChainInformation;
SELECT ItemName, Quantity, OrderDate FROM SupplyChainInformation;
SELECT Manufacturer, Retailer, Supplier FROM SupplyChainInformation WHERE Quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainInformation WHERE Manufacturer = 'XYZ Company';
SELECT ItemName, DeliveryDate FROM SupplyChainInformation ORDER BY DeliveryDate DESC;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainInformation WHERE ItemName = 'Laptop' ORDER BY Quantity DESC;
SELECT ItemName, Manufacturer, Quantity FROM SupplyChainInformation WHERE Retailer = 'Amazon' AND Supplier = 'Apple' ORDER BY OrderDate ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT Manufacturer FROM SupplyChainInformation WHERE Quantity > 100;
SELECT Retailer, Supplier, OrderDate, DeliveryDate FROM SupplyChainInformation WHERE Manufacturer = 'Samsung' ORDER BY DeliveryDate DESC;
SELECT ItemName, Manufacturer, Quantity FROM SupplyChainInformation WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_info;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer FROM supply_chain_info WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM supply_chain_info ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, receiver, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE sender = 'Retailer';
SELECT AVG(quantity) as avg_quantity FROM supply_chain_info;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_info WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer FROM supply_chain_info WHERE production_date >= '2021-01-01' AND production_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(product_id) AS total_products, manufacturer FROM supply_chain_info GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 2 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT th.* FROM transaction_history th LEFT JOIN supply_chain_info sci ON th.product_id = sci.product_id WHERE sci.quantity < 50 ORDER BY th.transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT t.sender, t.receiver, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_history t GROUP BY t.sender, t.receiver HAVING total_transactions > 1 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_info;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM supply_chain_info WHERE price > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity FROM supply_chain_info ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_info WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' AND amount < 500;
SELECT contract_id, supplier_id, buyer_id, contract_date FROM contract_info WHERE buyer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_info;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM supply_chain_info WHERE price > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, quantity, price FROM supply_chain_info WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity, price FROM supply_chain_info WHERE quantity > 100 AND price < 50 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT contract_id, supplier_id, buyer_id, contract_date FROM contract_info WHERE contract_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_info FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC, manufacturer DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, timestamp FROM products JOIN transactions ON products.product_id = transactions.product_id WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT contract_id, product_name, payment_amount FROM contracts JOIN products ON contracts.product_id = products.product_id WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY payment_amount DESC, contract_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Product_Inventory
SELECT shipment_id, supplier, destination FROM SupplyChain_Information
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM Supplier_Information
SELECT destination_name, address, contact_person FROM Destination_Information
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, transaction_type FROM Transaction_Log
SELECT * FROM SupplyChain_Information ORDER BY shipment_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, supplier, shipment_date FROM SupplyChain_Information WHERE destination='Warehouse';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM Supplier_Information WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT destination_name, address, contact_person, contact_number FROM Destination_Information WHERE contact_person LIKE '%Smith%';

SELECT Product_Inventory.product_name, Product_Inventory.quantity, Product_Inventory.storage_location, Supplier_Information.supplier_name FROM Product_Inventory INNER JOIN Supplier_Information ON Product_Inventory.product_name = Supplier_Information.supplier_name;
